original_text: Then Philip ran up to the chariot and heard the man reading Isaiah the prophet. “Do you understand what you are reading?” Philip asked.
korean_text: 빌립이 달려가서 선지자 이사야의 글 읽는 것을 듣고 말하되 읽는 것을 깨닫느냐

sentences.original_text: Then Philip ran up to the chariot
and heard the man reading Isaiah the prophet
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 사람이 이사야 예언자를 읽는 것을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: Do you understand what you are reading?
